video.title: The Adventures of the Young Marco Polo
video.synopsis: A young Marco Polo, accompanied by two friends, sets off on a wild misadventure through distant lands and mystical times to find his missing father.

episodes.synopsis: When Marco's father doesn't return from China, Luigi and Chinese princess Shi La try to help Marco recover his father's travel diary.
episodes.title: The Chinese Princess

episodes.synopsis: When they're discovered onboard the ship to China, the friends are chained below deck and face some grim-looking pirates.
episodes.title: Stowaways

episodes.synopsis: When the ship and its golden treasure sink in a storm, the three kids arrive on an island and try to free the villagers from an evil lord.
episodes.title: The Wreckers

episodes.synopsis: In Acre, the friends sign up for a squire boot camp because they need horses. But when they learn training takes seven years, they try to escape.
episodes.title: Knights of the Green Clover

episodes.synopsis: In the Syrian desert, Marco's father's diary is stolen. But with the help of a circus, the three friends have a chance to get it back.
episodes.title: Buried in the Sand

episodes.synopsis: In Alexandretta, Luigi becomes homesick and takes a ship back to Venice, abandoning Marco and Shi La when the city is under the threat of attack.
episodes.title: Homesickness

episodes.synopsis: In Mosul, the three kids meet someone who can lead them to a sunken city that's mentioned in Marco's father's diary.
episodes.title: The Sunken City

episodes.synopsis: In Baghdad, the Grand Vizier accuses the children of being in cahoots with a thief.
episodes.title: 1001st Arabian Night

episodes.synopsis: Shi La gets lost in a sandstorm. With the help of Ali Baba, Marco and Luigi venture into the desert to rescue her from the cave of the 40 thieves.
episodes.title: Ali Baba and the 40 Thieves

episodes.synopsis: In Isfahan, Marco challenges Prince Shazad's chess machine in order to receive exit passes and continue their journey.
episodes.title: The World's Best Chess Player

episodes.synopsis: When the friends reach the town of Hormuz, they realize that the people there have no water.
episodes.title: The Hot Winds of Hormuz

episodes.synopsis: Marco, Luigi and Shi La visit the desert city of Kerman, where they need to make a carpet fly in order to rescue the sultan's daughter from a tower.
episodes.title: The Flying Carpet

episodes.synopsis: While resting in a deserted caravansary, the kids witness a theft that helps them solve the mystery surrounding Ipek's father.
episodes.title: The Caravansary of Peace

episodes.synopsis: In Samarkand, Shi La is mistaken for Nasreen, a lost princess. In order to continue their journey, Marco and Luigi have to find the real princess.
episodes.title: The Riddles of Samarkand

episodes.synopsis: In the Central Asian steppe, the three friends compete in an equestrian tournament, taking the place of an injured rider.
episodes.title: The Tournament

episodes.synopsis: In Turkestan, the three kids have to find out why the sky is mysteriously turning black, scaring all the animals.
episodes.title: The Rulers of the Sun

episodes.synopsis: In Lop Nur, Marco, Luigi and Shi La meet Sinbad and join him, hoping that he can lead them out of the desert.
episodes.title: Sinbad and the Disappearing Sea

episodes.synopsis: In the Himalayas, the three friends meet an old woman who's helping a family with an important ceremony.
episodes.title: The Roof of the World

episodes.synopsis: When the three kids sample delicious food in the Himalayan hills, they want to help the restaurant win a cooking competition.
episodes.title: The Great Spice Showdown

episodes.synopsis: In the Indian jungle, Marco and his friends have to free Fufu, Shi La's pet, by fulfilling the village's prophecy.
episodes.title: Into the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: When the three kids reach China, they meet young prince Yi Yun, who knows little about the world outside the palace.
episodes.title: The Golden Cage

episodes.synopsis: In Xian, the young heroes are plunged into peril when they're kidnapped by pirates looking for information about merchant vessels.
episodes.title: River Pirates

episodes.synopsis: Each of the friends must catch a cricket in order to enter Lanzhou. They learn there's a competition for the best cricket, and the winner gets a boat.
episodes.title: At the Yellow River

episodes.synopsis: When the three friends hide at a Chinese opera, Shi La is recognized, and Marco and Luigi find out she isn't a princess after all.
episodes.title: The Chinese Opera

episodes.synopsis: In the countryside of China, the three friends learn that silk production is kept secret because it's China's most valuable product.
episodes.title: The Secret of the Silk

episodes.synopsis: When the three kids reach Khanbaliq, Marco finally locates his father, who is accused of printing money illegally.
episodes.title: The Court of the Kublai Khan
